officialTitle: Random-start Ovarian Stimulation in Egg-donors (ROSE) Trial: a Self-controlled Study
inclusionCriteria:
* Premenopausal women
* 18-35 years old
* FSH levels \< 10 IU/liter
* Antral follicle count (AFC) \> 10
* Regular cycles
* Body Mass Index (BMI) \< 28
* Signed informed consent
* Must be FEMALE
* Must have minimum age of 18 Years
* Must have maximum age of 35 Years
exclusionCriteria:
* Polycystic ovary syndrome (PCOS) patients
* Allergy to gonadotrophins
* Concomitant participation in other trial
